byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and ELIZABETH A. HARRIS

abstract: Several wild animals were still on the loose in an Ohio town on Wednesday after their owner had set them free and then killed himself, local authorities said.
snippet: Several wild animals were still on the loose in an Ohio town on Wednesday after their owner had set them free and then killed himself, local authorities said.

headline.main: Deputies Hunt Exotic Animals on the Loose in Ohio
